Working with Sach and his team was an immense and wonderful experience and I will be forever grateful for accepting my offer !
Sach is very responsive and went straight to the core of the feasibility of my project.
In my personal experience, it took me more than a year to create over a hundred highly detailed sketches including the same amount of pages to describe each of those features presented into the design concept.
After a few days to think about all those challenges that I had to face in regard of Sach feedback, I realized that in the « coding » realm, there are limitations and rules that can’t be trespassed. 
That’s where Sach and his 20 years of experiences shined. Rather than being in a state of hassle to push an agenda that has meant to not be possible, Sach became my best ally and a library of knowledge toward how I could possibly exploit them and make a change that would end on giving the same results as my initial goals.
That was a real collaboration, a true commitment in a daily basis of working process which i gladly took because i truly believe in my software concept and when you think something is worth to be real, everything should be done to make it possible and Sach has perfectly responded to all my expectations.
I would recommend anyone to sign for Sach and his Team if you want to give life to your project ! 
Discuss toward the matter, face the challenges and create a better alternative. That’s what I learned from him !
Sincerly, Assin Bouacherine
